WRITING.TITLE: Ales Kot, the writer taking comic books to mindbending new dimensions. He has only been in graphic storytelling for three years, but already the Czech-born writer has produced several influential series for the biggest publishers and his latest is set to reinvent crime noir.
The Story About Hiroshima and Nagasaki Youve Never Heard.
Quantum of solace information can be rescued from a black hole.
Two Chelsea fans given football banning orders of five years for racially abusing a black passenger on Paris Metro.

Leaked emails between Italian spyware vendor Hacking Team and Boeing subsidiary Insitu revealed that drones carrying malware to infect targeted computers via Wi-Fi by flying over their proximity is close to becoming a reality.

WRITING.TEXT: This has gone beyond McCarthy, many are voicing discontent.

WRITING.TITLE: Critic's Notebook: Todd McCarthy on BBC's Bizarre Poll of Best American Films.
